title: Utilities

fields.name: Effects:
fields.value:
- Houses and Hotels cannot be built on Utilities
- Max 2 utilities per game.
- Rent on Utilities have the following rules:
- If one property in the Utilities set is owned, then rent is 4 times the amount shown on the die.
- If both properties in the Utilities set are owned, then rent is 10 times the amount shown on the die.

desc: How many games of Monopoly ended just because someone landed onto one of these?
